basic.description: This course builds on the foundations of data analysis and decision modeling set in Comm 162* and Comm 163*.  The emphasis in this course is advance managerial decision making under uncertainty.  Topics include stochastic inventory control, waiting-line models, computer simulation modeling, risk and decision analysis, forecasting models, revenue management, and dynamic pricing.  Computer spreadsheets will be used extensively, and a particular focus will be the interpretation and communication of model results from the viewpoint of decision makers.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Operations Research II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion: COMM365 excludes MATH337.
Prerequisite of COMM162 and COMM163 and registered in a BCOM Academic Program) or registered in a COMM-X Academic Plan.
